overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a presence on Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, focusing on research and announcements related to computational social science, disinformation, and information operations. LinkedIn has the largest follower base, while Bluesky appears to have the most active posting schedule. The content leans heavily toward academic and professional updates.

platformInsights.bluesky: Bluesky is used actively for sharing research publications and conference announcements, suggesting a focus on academic peers.
